00027 #include <geometry/ISurfaceAbstract.h>
00028 #include <geometry/ILinearRing.h>
00029 #include <common/Collection.h>
00030 /// \brief
00031 /// The GisIPolygon class is a polygon Geometry type.  
00032 /// GisIPolygon is defined by one exterior boundary and zero or more 
00033 /// interior boundaries.
00034 /// Each of the boundaries must be a closed, simple LinearRing.
00035 class GisIPolygon : public GisISurfaceAbstract
00036 {
00037 public:
00038 
00039     /// \brief
00040     /// Gets the ring defining the outer boundary.
00041     /// 
00042     /// \return
00043     /// Returns the exterior ring
00044     /// 
00045     GISGEOM_API virtual GisILinearRing* GetExteriorRing() const = 0;
00046 
00047     /// \brief
00048     /// Gets the number of interior rings.
00049     /// 
00050     /// \return
00051     /// Returns the number of interior rings
00052     /// 
00053     GISGEOM_API virtual GisInt32 GetInteriorRingCount() const = 0;
00054 
00055     /// \brief
00056     /// Gets the interior ring at the specified (zero-based) index.
00057     /// 
00058     /// \param index 
00059     /// Input Zero-based index in the object's list of interior rings.
00060     /// 
00061     /// \return
00062     /// Returns the interior ring
00063     /// 
00064     GISGEOM_API virtual GisILinearRing* GetInteriorRing(
00065         GisInt32 index) const = 0;
00066 
00067 protected:
00068 
00069     /// \brief
00070     /// Constructs a default instance.
00071     /// 
00072     /// \return
00073     /// Returns nothing
00074     /// 
00075     GISGEOM_API GisIPolygon() {};
00076 
00077     /// \brief
00078     /// Default destructor.
00079     /// 
00080     /// \return
00081     /// Returns nothing
00082     /// 
00083     GISGEOM_API virtual ~GisIPolygon() {};
00084 };
00085 
00086 
00087 /// \brief
00088 ///  The GisPolygonCollection class is a collection of CurvePolygon objects.
00089 class GisPolygonCollection : public GisCollection<GisIPolygon, GisException>
00090 {
00091 public:
00092     /// \brief
00093     ///  Creates an instance of GisPolygonCollection with no contained elements.
00094     /// 
00095     /// \return
00096     /// Returns an empty collection
00097     /// 
00098     static GisPolygonCollection* Create()
00099     {
00100         GisPolygonCollection* value = new GisPolygonCollection();
00101         if (NULL == value)
00102             throw GisException::Create(GisException::NLSGetMessage(GIS_NLSID(GIS_1_BADALLOC)));
00103 
00104         return value;
00105     }
00106 
00107 protected:
00108     void Dispose()
00109     {
00110         delete this;
00111     }
00112 };
00113 #endif
